content: On the right, you'll find a tree where you can harvest a Fire Date just after a Scorching-Fire enemy. Be careful of the Flamling that will emerge as you go up to it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Cooling Slope' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Mother of Flamlings'.
The content is as follows:
On the right, you'll find a tree where you can harvest a Fire Date just after a Scorching-Fire enemy. Be careful of the Flamling that will emerge as you go up to it.
